vsParam:
Ahhhh-hhaaaaa... so sleepy...
Wow, [px] you yawn so much too... Hmm...

Hey, why are you so tired early in the morning?
Come on, students of the Academy, giddy-up.

Ah, it's Hazel~
I am not a student~

It will be "President" Hazel, thank you.
Student or not, it's the same.

As long as you are part of the Academy,
you are expected to present well...

Wow, so loud...
This voice... [px], should we go check?

Come on, students, regroup!
I, Silver Birch, am going to introduce you to my latest invention!

Sure enough. It's Silver Birch Sensei's "Old-School"
stuff again. I wonder what it will be today...

Alas... Uncle, why such a gathering again...
As your dear niece, I'm really embarrassed...

Oh, that's right.
Silver Birch Sensei is Hazel's uncle.

Mmm... He is a first-class researcher,
but he always do things without any common sense...

All right, good, lots of people came. Great, let me start then.
Let me show you my life's masterpiece...
"Space-time Controller N°4"!

Hello everyone, I am "Space-time Controller N°4"!
But please, just call me "Popy"!

Wow, its amazing!
That machine can even speak!

Ohoho, it's far more capable than just speech.
Popy can perform "Space-time Distortion" at will!

Well, it can only perform mini "Space-time Distortion",
which is—entering a different world and taking things
from it before coming back...

So, that is Popy's function!
Of course, I took all necessary precautions regarding security!!

Uhh...
How did uncle manage to create a weirdo again...

Wowowoo, that's impressive~
Silver Birch Sensei is really amazing~!!
Woo—!! I also want to try Popy!

Of course, of course!
Ohoho, ohohohoho!

Yes. Popy is all yours now.
Let the students try it if they are interested.

Huh—!? What... What's this about!
Why should I keep it?

You are my niece, and a Relicology student, and you are
familiar with machines, and if that's not enough,
you are also the Student Union President!!

All right, Popy, you must serve everyone well!
Thank you, Hazel! Ohoho!

Goodbye, Master~!
At your service, new Master Hazel!!

Wait, wait wait wait! I don't want to be your Master!
Uncle, come back here! Ah, uh...

Hazel... I...
I'd really like to try it... try "Popy"...

No, no no no, wait! Wait wait wait!
I am telling you to wait, waaaaah!
